channel.title: CVE Feed for Synology -- DNS Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Synology -- DNS Server

item.title: CVE-2022-27615|2024-08-03T05:32:59.223Z -- synology -- dns%20server
item.description: Improper limitation of a pathname to a restricted directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in cgi component in Synology DNS Server before 2.2.2-5027 allows remote authenticated users to delete arbitrary files via unspecified vectors.
